roleset.name: to prevent or defeat
roleset.note: FOIL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'foil' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from foil.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Kryuchkov was quoted [*-1] as [*-2]saying that in place of the infamous 5th Directorate [a new unit]-3 would work `` [*-3] to foil the conspiracies [*ICH*-4] of foreign intelligence services [*] to create and use organized anti-government groups in our country . ''
example.arg: the conspiracies [*ICH*-4] of foreign intelligence services [*]to create and use organized anti-government groups in our country

example.name: curses! foiled again!
example.text: [*-1]-2 Foiled [*-2]in their effort [*] to get a national ban , [the egg producers] -1 turned their attention to the states .
example.arg: in their effort [*] to get a national ban
